committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning June 20, 1976, and ending June 26, 1976, as National Truck Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning June 20, 1976, as "National Truck Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning June 20, 1976, and ending June 26, 1976, as National Truck Week.
